title: For the purpose of, "Carpet area" as per 1
clause_text: For the purpose of, "Carpet area" as per 1.1 &1.2 above means the net usable floor area within a tenement excluding that covered by the walls or any other areas specifically exempted from floor space index computation as per then/prevailing Regulation but including the areas of balcony if allowed free of FSI as per then Regulation

source_pdf.text_snippet: For the purpose of, "Carpet area" as per 1.1 &1.2 above means the net usable floor area within a tenement excluding that covered by the walls or any other areas specifically exempted from floor space
